DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct investigate effect daily supplementation Angelica gigas N. extract improvement Blood Triglyceride .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Angelica Gigas N. Extract Improvement Blood Triglyceride
DOC.detailed_description: This study 12 week , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled human trial . Twenty subject randomly divide Angelica gigas N. extract placebo group . Fasting triglyceride profile intervention .
DOC.criteria: Age 1980 year Triglyceride 150200 mg/dL Lipid lower agent within past 6 month Severe cardiovascular disease ( Mvocardial infarction , Stroke , etc ) Renal disease ( Heredity hyperlipidemia , Acute/Chronic renal failure , Nephrotic syndrome , etc ) Cancer , Respiratory organ disease ( Asthma , Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ) Autoimmune disease Diabetes mellitus Allergic hypersensitive ingredient test product History disease could interfere test product impede absorption Under antipsychotic drug therapy within past 2 month History alcohol substance abuse Participation clinical trial within past 2 month Laboratory test show follow result aspartate aminotransferase , alanine aminotransferase > Reference range upper limit treble Serum Creatinine > 2.0 mg/dl Pregnancy breast feed Not Contraception ( except : Surgery female infertility )
